verses.verse: And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, that on<WG1722> one<WG1520> of those<WG1565> days<WG2250>, as he<WG846> taught<WG1321> the people<WG2992> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411>, and<WG2532> preached the gospel<WG2097>, the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the scribes<WG1122> came to<WG2186> him with<WG4862> the elders<WG4245>,

And<WG2532> spoke<WG2036> to<WG4314> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Tell<WG2036> us<WG2254>, by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> do you<WG4160> these things<WG5023>? Or<WG2228> who<WG5101> is<WG2076> he that<WG3588> gave<WG1325> you<WG4671> this<WG3778> authority<WG1849>?
And<WG1161> he answered<WG611> and said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them<WG846>, I will<WG2065> also<WG2504> ask<WG2065> you<WG5209> one<WG1520> thing<WG3056>; and<WG2532> answer<WG2036> me<WG3427>:
The baptism<WG908> of John<WG2491>, was it<WG2258> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, or<WG2228> of<WG1537> men<WG444>?

And<WG1161> they reasoned<WG4817> with<WG4314> themselves<WG1438>, saying<WG3754>, If<WG1437> we shall say<WG2036>, From<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>; he will say<WG1223>, Why<WG5101> then<WG3767> believed you<WG4100> him<WG846> not<WG3756>?

But and<WG1161> if<WG1437> we say<WG2036>, Of<WG1537> men<WG444>; all<WG3956> the people<WG2992> will stone<WG2642> us<WG2248>: for<WG1063> they are<WG1511> persuaded that<WG3982> John<WG2491> was<WG2076> a prophet<WG4396>.
And<WG2532> they answered<WG611>, that they could<WG1492> not<WG3361> tell<WG1492> from where it was<WG4159>.
And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to them<WG846>, Neither<WG3761> tell<WG3004> I<WG1473> you<WG5213> by<WG1722> what<WG4169> authority<WG1849> I do<WG4160> these things<WG5023>.

Then<WG1161> began he<WG756> to speak<WG3004> to<WG4314> the people<WG2992> this<WG3778> parable<WG3850>; A certain<WG5100> man<WG444> planted<WG5452> a vineyard<WG290>, and<WG2532> let<WG1554> it<WG846> forth<WG1554> to farmers<WG1092>, and<WG2532> went into a far country<WG589> for a long<WG2425> time<WG5550>.

And<WG2532> at<WG1722> the harvest season<WG2540> he sent<WG649> a servant<WG1401> to<WG4314> the farmers<WG1092>, that<WG2443> they should give<WG1325> him<WG846> of<WG575> the fruit<WG2590> of the vineyard<WG290>: but<WG1161> the farmers<WG1092> beat<WG1194> him<WG846>, and sent<WG1821> him away<WG1821> empty<WG2756>.

And<WG2532> again<WG4369> he sent<WG3992> another<WG2087> servant<WG1401>: and<WG1161> they beat<WG1194> him also<WG2548>, and<WG2532> treated<WG818> him shamefully<WG818>, and sent<WG1821> him away<WG1821> empty<WG2756>.
And<WG2532> again<WG4369> he sent<WG3992> a third<WG5154>: and<WG1161> they wounded<WG5135> him<WG5126> also<WG2532>, and cast<WG1544> him out<WG1544>.

Then<WG1161> said<WG2036> the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290>, What<WG5101> shall I do<WG4160>? I will send<WG3992> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> son<WG5207>: it may be<WG2481> they will respect<WG1788> him when they see<WG1492> him<WG5126>.

But<WG1161> when the farmers<WG1092> saw<WG1492> him<WG846>, they reasoned<WG1260> among<WG4314> themselves<WG1438>, saying<WG3004>, This<WG3778> is<WG2076> the heir<WG2818>: come<WG1205>, let us kill<WG615> him<WG846>, that<WG2443> the inheritance<WG2817> may be<WG1096> ours<WG2257>.

So<WG2532> they cast<WG1544> him<WG846> out of<WG1854> the vineyard<WG290>, and killed<WG615> him<WG5101>. What therefore<WG3767> shall<WG4160> the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> do<WG4160> to them<WG846>?

He shall come<WG2064> and<WG2532> destroy<WG622> these<WG5128> farmers<WG1092>, and<WG2532> shall give<WG1325> the vineyard<WG290> to others<WG243>. And when<WG1161> they heard<WG191> it<WG3361>, they said, God forbid<WG1096>.

And<WG1161> he looked<WG1689> them<WG846>, and said<WG2036>, What<WG5101> is<WG2076> this<WG5124> then<WG3767> that<WG3588> is written<WG1125>, The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the builders<WG3618> rejected<WG593>, the same<WG3778> is become<WG1096> the<WG1519> head<WG2776> of the corner<WG1137>?

Whoever<WG3956> shall fall<WG4098> upon<WG1909> that<WG1565> stone<WG3037> shall be broken<WG4917>; but<WG1161> on<WG1909> whomever<WG3739><WG99999> it shall fall<WG4098>, it will grind<WG3039> him<WG846> to powder<WG3039>.

And<WG2532> the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> the scribes<WG1122><WG99999> the same<WG846> hour<WG5610> sought<WG2212> to lay<WG1911> hands<WG5495> on<WG1909> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> they feared<WG5399> the people<WG2992>: for<WG1063> they perceived<WG1097> that<WG3754> he had spoken<WG2036> this<WG3778> parable<WG3850> against<WG4314> them<WG846>.

And<WG2532> they watched<WG3906> him<WG649>, and sent forth spies<WG1455>, which should pretend<WG5271><WG99999> to be<WG1511> just men<WG1342>, that<WG2443> they might take hold<WG1949> of his<WG846> words<WG3056>, that so<WG2443> they might deliver<WG3860> him<WG846> to<WG1519> the power<WG746> and<WG2532> authority<WG1849> of the governor<WG2232>.

And<WG2532> they asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, Master<WG1320>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> you say<WG3004> and<WG2532> teach<WG1321> rightly<WG2532>, neither<WG3756> are you<WG2983> partial to men<WG4383> of any standing<WG235>, but teach<WG1321> the way<WG3598> of God<WG2316><WG99999> truly<WG225>:
Is it lawful<WG1832> for us<WG2254> to give<WG1325> tribute<WG5411> to Cæsar<WG2541>, or<WG2228> not<WG3756>?
But<WG1161> he perceived<WG2657> their<WG846> craftiness<WG3834>, and said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> tempt<WG3985> me<WG3165>?
Show<WG1925> me<WG3427> a penny<WG1220>. Whose<WG5101> image<WG1504> and<WG2532> superscription<WG1923> is on it<WG2192>? They answered<WG611> and<WG1161> said<WG2036>, Cæsar<WG2541>'s.

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to them<WG846>, Render<WG591> therefore<WG5106> to Cæsar<WG2541> the things<WG3588> which are Cæsar<WG2541>'s, and<WG2532> to God<WG2316> the things<WG3588> which are God<WG2316>'s.

And<WG2532> they could<WG2480> not<WG3756> trap him in<WG1949> his<WG846> words<WG4487> before<WG1726> the people<WG2992>: and<WG2532> they marveled<WG2296> at<WG1909> his<WG846> answer<WG612>, and held their peace<WG4601>.
Then<WG1161> came to<WG4334> him certain<WG5100> of the Sadducees<WG4523>, which<WG3588> deny that<WG483> there is<WG1511><WG99999> any resurrection<WG386>; and they asked<WG1905> him<WG846>,

Saying<WG3004>, Master<WG1320>, Moses<WG3475> wrote<WG1125> to us<WG2254>, If<WG1437> any man<WG5100>'s brother<WG80> die<WG599>, having<WG2192> a wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> he<WG3778> die<WG599> without sons<WG815>, that<WG2443> his<WG846> brother<WG80> should take<WG2983> his wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> raise up<WG1817> seed<WG4690> to his<WG846> brother<WG80>.
There were<WG2258> therefore<WG3767> seven<WG2033> brothers<WG80>: and<WG2532> the first<WG4413> took<WG2983> a wife<WG1135>, and died<WG599> without sons<WG815>.
And<WG2532> the second<WG1208> took<WG2983> her to wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> he<WG3778> died<WG599> childless<WG815>.
And<WG2532> the third<WG5154> took<WG2983> her<WG846>; and<WG1161> in like manner<WG5615> the seven<WG2033> also<WG2532>: and they left<WG2641> no<WG3756> sons<WG5043>, and<WG2532> died<WG599>.
Last<WG5305> of all<WG3956> the woman<WG1135> died<WG599> also<WG2532>.
Therefore<WG3767> in<WG1722> the resurrection<WG386> whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> of them<WG846> is she<WG1096>? For<WG1063> seven<WG2033> had<WG2192> her<WG846> to wife<WG1135>.
And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> to them<WG846>, The sons<WG5207> of this<WG5127> world<WG165> marry<WG1060>, and<WG2532> are given in marriage<WG1548>:

But<WG1161> they which<WG3588> shall be accounted worthy<WG2661> to obtain<WG5177> that<WG1565> world<WG165>, and<WG2532> the resurrection<WG386> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, neither<WG3777> marry<WG1060>, nor<WG3777> are given in marriage<WG1548>:

Neither<WG3777> can<WG1410> they die<WG599> any more<WG2089>: for<WG1063> they are<WG1526> equal to the angels<WG2465>; and<WG2532> are<WG1526> the sons<WG5207> of God<WG2316>, being<WG5607> the sons<WG5207> of the resurrection<WG386>.

Now<WG1161> that<WG3754> the dead<WG3498> are raised<WG1453>, even<WG2532> Moses<WG3475> showed<WG3377> at<WG1909> the bush<WG942>, when<WG5613> he calls<WG3004> the Lord<WG2962> the God<WG2316> of Abraham<WG11>, and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of Isaac<WG2464>, and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of Jacob<WG2384>.
For<WG1161> he is<WG2076> not<WG3756> a God<WG2316> of the dead<WG3498>, but<WG235> of the living<WG2198>: for<WG1063> all<WG3956> live<WG2198> to him<WG846>.
Then<WG1161> certain<WG5100> of the scribes<WG1122> answering<WG611> said<WG2036>, Master<WG1320>, you have<WG2036> well<WG2573> said<WG2036>.
And after that<WG1161> they dared<WG5111> not<WG3765> ask<WG1905> him<WG846> any question at all<WG3762>.
And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them<WG846>, How<WG4459> say they<WG3004> that Christ<WG5547> is<WG1511> David<WG1138>'s son<WG5207>?

And<WG2532> David<WG1138> himself<WG846> says<WG3004> in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of Psalms<WG5568>, The Lord<WG2962> said<WG2036> to my<WG3450> Lord<WG2962>, Sit you<WG2521> on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand<WG1188>,
Until<WG2193><WG99999> I make<WG5087> your<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> your<WG4675> footstool<WG4228>.
David<WG1138> therefore<WG3767> calls<WG2564> him<WG846> Lord<WG2962>, how<WG4459> is he<WG2076> then<WG2532> his<WG846> son<WG5207>?
Then<WG1161> in the hearing<WG191> of all<WG3956> the people<WG2992> he said<WG2036> to his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>,

Beware<WG4337> of<WG575> the scribes<WG1122>, which<WG3588> desire<WG2309> to walk<WG4043> in<WG1722> long robes<WG4749>, and<WG2532> love<WG5368> greetings<WG783> in<WG1722> the markets<WG58>, and<WG2532> the highest seats<WG4410> in<WG1722> the synagogues<WG4864>, and<WG2532> the chief rooms<WG4411> at<WG1722> feasts<WG1173>;

Which<WG3739> devour<WG2719> widows<WG5503>' houses<WG3614>, and<WG2532> for a show<WG4392> make<WG4336> long<WG3117> prayers<WG4336>: the same<WG3778> shall receive<WG2983> greater<WG4053> damnation<WG2917>.
